original_title: Fernando Martín Peña: La proyección del mundo
overview: After almost 20 years, Fernando Martín Peña returns to the Faculty of Arts of the National University of La Plata to teach the subject History of Cinema II. Little by little, the reflections, questions and contradictions of the students who wonder about the study of the history of cinema begin.
title: Fernando Martín Peña: La proyección del mundo
